attributes.action: Award a posthumous knighthood to Bill Mclaren
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Bill Mclaren was the greatest rugby commentator of all time, always unbiased, always fair, always entertaining. He was a great supporter of grassroots rugby and had great influence in training children in the game. He was an ambassador for rugby, recognised and admired internationally, and as such should have been knighted.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
